## Recruitment & Promotion

Includes questions 9-10, codes: WCJC013, WCJC014 

### `r varlabel("WCJC013")`

```{r invite_promo, eval=varexists("WCJC013") }
data %>% 
    filter(!is.na(WCJC013) & hideNA) %>% 
    ggplot(aes(x=WCJC013, fill=WCJC013)) + 
    geom_bar()+ 
    scale_fill_brewer(palette="Set1") +
    labs(title="") +
    guides(fill=F) +
    theme_light() +
    theme(axis.title.x = element_blank())
```

```{r invite_promot_tab, eval=varexists("WCJC013")}
print_frqtable(data$WCJC013)
```

### `r varlabel("WCJC014")`
```{r obtain_post, eval=varexists("WCJC014"), fig.width=8, fig.height=4}
data %>% 
    filter(!is.na(WCJC014) & hideNA) %>% 
    ggplot(aes(x=WCJC014, fill=WCJC014)) + 
    geom_bar() + 
    scale_fill_brewer(palette="Set1") +
    coord_flip() + 
    labs(y="Total count") +
    guides(fill=F) +
    theme_light() +
    theme(axis.title.y=element_blank())
```

